Hero.Title: Discover the world of art
Hero.Subtitle: Change the way art is valued
Hero.Description: Paint your world with a vibrant collection of original paintings. Explore captivating landscapes, intimate portraits, and everything in between. Support talented artists and own a piece of their story. Whether you seek a specific style, a captivating color palette, or a theme that resonates with you, the perfect painting awaits to be discovered.

Landing.Hear what our clients say about us: Hear what our clients say about us
Landing.testDescription: I had an amazing experience with this art platform. The curation is top-notch, and I found some incredible pieces that I never would have discovered otherwise.
Landing.about: Paint your world with a vibrant collection of original paintings. Explore captivating landscapes, intimate portraits, and everything in between. Support talented artists and own a piece of their story. Whether you seek a specific style, a captivating color palette, or a theme that resonates with you, the perfect painting awaits to be discovered.

About.Title: Who are we?
About.Description: Passionate about connecting art enthusiasts with exceptional works, we built Kuru as a curated online marketplace. Here, talented artists can showcase their creations and find dedicated collectors who appreciate their work. We take pride in offering a secure platform for transactions, ensuring peace of mind for both buyers and sellers. More than just a marketplace, we foster a vibrant community where artists and collectors can connect directly. So, whether you're searching for that perfect piece to add to your collection or eager to share your artistic vision with the world, KURU is your gateway to a world of artistic discovery.
About.ForArtistDescription: When you join kuru, you join our entire community for a friendlier, fairer world for artists. As well as reaching a global audience, you receive dedicated support at every step of the way
About.ForBuyerDescription: We match you with original artwork we know you’ll love – and help you support artists at the same time. Directly connect with artists and find the perfect piece for you, no matter your taste or budget.
About.Where Artists Meet Collectors: Discover: Where Artists Meet Collectors: Discover Your Perfect Piece

FAQ.Title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.question1: How do I know the art on Kuru is authentic?
FAQ.answer1: At Kuru, we prioritize authenticity. Every artwork listed undergoes a verification process to ensure it is genuine...
FAQ.question2: Is it safe to buy and sell art through Kuru?
FAQ.answer2: Yes! Kuru provides a secure platform for both buyers and sellers...
FAQ.question3: Can I connect with the artist directly?
FAQ.answer3: Absolutely! Kuru encourages direct communication between artists and collectors...

meta.title: Privacy Policy | Kuru - Online Art Marketplace
meta.description: Read our privacy policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your data on our online art marketplace.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content1: Welcome to Kuru, the online marketplace for Ethiopian artists. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.
introduction.content2: By accessing or using our service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: When you register an account, we may collect:
items: Name, email address, and contact information
Payment and billing information (processed securely through our payment processor)

artworkData.title: Artwork and Transaction Data
artworkData.description: When you use our platform as an artist or buyer, we collect:

technicalData.title: Technical Data
technicalData.description: We automatically collect certain information when you visit our platform:
items: IP address, browser type, and device information
Usage data (pages visited, time spent, etc.)

platformOperation.title: Platform Operation
platformOperation.description: To provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you about your account.

securityCompliance.title: Security & Compliance
securityCompliance.description: To protect against fraud, comply with legal obligations, and enforce our terms of service.

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: To personalize your experience, recommend artworks, and improve our platform's functionality.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: With your consent, to send promotional communications about new features or artworks.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

items.label: With artists/buyers
items.detail: Necessary information to complete transactions (e.g., shipping details)

items.label: Service providers
items.detail: Trusted third parties who assist in platform operation (payment processors, hosting services)

items.label: Legal requirements
items.detail: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety

items.label: Business transfers
items.detail: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

dataSharing.noSelling: We never sell your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:
dataSecurity.disclaimer: While we strive to protect your data, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.description: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:
items: Access and request a copy of your data
Request deletion of your data (subject to legal requirements)
Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent
yourRights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@kuru-art.com.

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.description1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
policyChanges.description2: Your continued use of our platform after any modification constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Artworks.Explore: Explore variety of art piece in all categories of your liking

Artist.description: Immerse yourself in a world of artistic brilliance! Explore our curated selection of talented artists, each with a unique voice and style.
Artist.Subject: Subject
Artist.BestsellingArtistsDesc: Meet the creators behind our most-loved artworks. These artists have captured hearts with their exceptional talent and consistent quality.
Artist.RisingArtistsDesc: Discover fresh voices shaping the future of art. Support emerging talents before they become household names.
